allOf.description: Common information about an antibody used in a number of immune-oncology assays

antibody.description: Antibody type collected for this study.

cat_num.description: Antibody registry catalog number assigned to antibody sample.

clone.description: Resulting type of antibody clone from primary antibody sample.

company.description: Company from which antibody sample was derived.

lot_num.description: Identification number assigned to the particular quantity or lot of material from manufacturer.

staining_order.description: Order in which samples were stained for procedure.

allOf.title: Antibody

description: Data specific to antibody prepration on the multiplex immunoflourescence platform.

amplification_time.description: Length of time required for amplified signal detection.

antigen_retrieval_time.description: Length of time needed for antigen retrieval.

dilutent.description: Dilution agent used for antibody sample.

fluor_dilution.description: Concentration ratio for fluor dilution agent.

fluor_wavelength.description: Wavelength registered for Alexa Fluor processing.

primary_ab_dilution.description: Concentration ratio for primary antibody dilution.

primary_incubation_time.description: Length of time for primary antibody incubation.

title: mIF antibody
